VCXCloseExperienceCmd.Title: Close Experience
VCXCloseExperienceCmd.ShortHelp: Brings you back to the welcome page and closes the presentation.
VCXCloseExperienceCmd.LongHelp:
Options in the dialog box:
  • Click Save to save and close the experience.
  • Click Discard to exit the experience without saving it.
  • Click Close to return to the experience.
VCXUserPreferencesCmd.Title: MePreferences
VCXCameraPlayModeCmd.Title: Play Camera
VCXHideSelectionCmd.Title: Hide Selection
VCXHideSelectionCmd.ShortHelp: Hides the selected parts of a model.
VCXMoveRobotOnBBoxCenterCmd.Title: Set the robot on selection's bounding box center
VCXMoveRobotOnBBoxCenterCmd.ShortHelp: Places the robot in the center of the selection's bounding box.
VCXShowAllCmd.Title: Show All
VCXInvertVisibilityCmd.Title: Invert visibility
VCXInvertVisibilityCmd.ShortHelp: Switches on or off the visibility of all objects in the scene.
VCXShowSelectionCmd.Title: Show Selection
VCXTransformCmd.Title: Transform
VCXTransformCmd.ShortHelp: Displays a robot for the selected part that lets you edit its position and rotation.
VCXTransformCmd.LongHelp: You can edit several translation parameters by selecting multiple objects using the Ctrl key.Edit the position along the u/x, w/z or y/y axes of the robot.
VCXTransformFreeDragCmd.Title: Free Drag
VCXTransformFreeDragCmd.ShortHelp: Enables you to reposition the object by dragging it to where you want it to be.
VCXUndoCmd.Title: Undo
VCXUndoCmd.ShortHelp: Reverts the last operation you did.
VCXRedoCmd.Title: Redo
VCXPlayGuidedTourCmd.Title: Play Guided Tour
VCXPlayGuidedTourCmd.ShortHelp: Plays the scenarios one by one.
VCXContextualContentMenuCmd.Title: Do nothing
VCXSelectSimilarInstance.Title: Select all instances
VCXSelectSimilarInstance.ShortHelp: Replace the selection with all the part that have the same reference than one element of the selection
VCXSelectSimilarInstanceActionBar.Title: Select All Instances
VCXSelectSimilarInstanceActionBar.ShortH: Lets you add to a selection all parts that have the same references as the selected parts.
VCXSelectSimilarInstanceActionBar.LongHe: You can either select parts and use the command, or use the command and then select parts.
VCXSelectSimilarColor.Title: Select by Color
VCXSelectSimilarColor.ShortHelp: Replace the selection with all the part that have a similar color than one element of the selection
VCXSelectSimilarColorActionBar.Title: Select by Color
VCXSelectSimilarColorActionBar.ShortHelp: Lets you add to a selection all parts that have the same material or CAD color as the selected part.
VCXSelectSimilarColorActionBar.LongHelp: You can either select parts and then use the command, or use the command and then select parts.
VCXSelectMarkupsDisable.Title: Markup Selection Mode
VCXSelectMarkupsDisable.ShortHelp: Lets you add markups to your selection.
VCXSelectMarkupsDisable.LongHelp: When you activate the Markup Selection Mode, you can add markups to your selection. If you deactivate it, you cannot add markups to your selection anymore.
VCXSelectGeometriesDisable.Title: Geometry Selection Mode
VCXSelectGeometriesDisable.ShortHelp: Lets you add parts or assemblies to a selection.
VCXSelectGeometriesDisable.LongHelp: When you activate the Gemetry Selection Mode, you can add parts and assemblies to your selection. If you deactivate it, you cannot add geometries to your selection anymore.
VCXSelectMarkupsEnable.Title: Markup Selection Mode
VCXSelectMarkupsEnable.ShortHelp: Lets you add markups to your selection.
VCXSelectMarkupsEnable.LongHelp: When you activate the Markup Selection Mode, you can add markups to your selection. If you deactivate it, you cannot add markups to your selection anymore.
VCXSelectGeometriesEnable.Title: Geometry Selection Mode
VCXSelectGeometriesEnable.ShortHelp: Lets you add parts or assemblies to a selection.
VCXSelectGeometriesEnable.LongHelp: When you activate the Gemetry Selection Mode, you can add parts and assemblies to your selection. If you deactivate it, you cannot add geometries to your selection anymore.
VCXApplyTransformationCmd.Title: Apply Transformation
VCXApplyTransformationCmd.ShortHelp: Lets you apply the same transformation from a part or an assembly to other parts or assemblies.
VCXApplyTransformationCmd.LongHelp: It allows applying the exactly same transformation, including translation, rotation and scaling, from one part or assembly to other parts or assemblies. The command helper guides you through the steps required to use the command.
VCXSwapVisibleSpaceEnable.Title: Swap Visible Space
VCXSwapVisibleSpaceEnable.ShortHelp: Displays objects transferred to the hidden space.
VCXSwapVisibleSpaceEnable.LongHelp: All markups and visible objects are not displayed. The color of the corners of the canvas changes to identify this space.
VCXSwapVisibleSpaceDisable.Title: Swap Visible Space
VCXSwapVisibleSpaceDisable.ShortHelp: Displays objects transferred to the hidden space.
VCXSwapVisibleSpaceDisable.LongHelp: All markups and visible objects are not displayed. The color of the corners of the canvas changes to identify this space.
VCXShowSelectionInNonVisibleSpaceCmd.Sho: Shows the selection in the visible space.
VCXShowSelectionInNonVisibleSpaceCmd.Lon: Hides the selected objects in the non-visible space and transfers them to the visible one.
